item.title: Run Completion Events
item.description:
Run Completion Events Reference

This section provides the canonical technical specification for run completion events in the KFP Operator, including event schemas, integration patterns, and system behavior.

Run completion events are created by a Provider to signal the completion of a pipeline run, and is used to trigger downstream processes. Within the operator this can be updating the status fields of resources such as their synchronizationState or providerId. Within the ML Ops ecosystem, this can also be used to reload a serving instance of a model with the newly trained version.
